name: places/ChIJbz1TL6ZZwokRv_VvWdOElb0
adrFormatAddress: 267 5th Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text:
I visited this beautiful event space 4 times; once as a guest and three times as a caterer. And each and every time, I was able to create awesome memories. The view is spectacular, especially at evening hours.

As a caterer, there are many other venues that offer spectacular panoramic views, but not every venues are pleasant to work at.  It it was very pleasant to work at this venue, from using the freight elevator to work with venue employees to arrange many complicated logistics. As the result, I was able to offer my client the absolute best catering service.

It comes at typical NYC price but I highly recommend anyone to host their corporate, non-profit and wedding events at Midtown Loft.

originalText.text: We held our wedding at Midtown Loft & Terrace this September. The venue is gorgeous. Everything went perfectly. The retractable roof made it so the roof seemed like a secret garden in NYC in the rain. Steve, our venue coordinator, was so helpful and attentive throughout the night. Chelsea and Ibrahim were also great to work with in the preparation. There are kitchens on both the roof and the loft level. Elevators quickly got guests up to the venue space. So happy we chose this venue for our wedding!

originalText.text: I had the pleasure of hosting an event at Midtown Loft & Terrace and I can't say enough about the incredible experience it provided. It has a beautiful view of the Empire State Building and Marble Collegiate Church. The staff were very professional, attentive and accommodating. From the initial planning stages to the day of the event, their expertise was evident. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: We were searching for a great space to host our special event. There are many venues to choose from in New York. The decision needs to be perfect for a once in a lifetime party!  Midtown was that space.  The venue and staff are absolutely amazing!  The views are breath breathtaking and our guests were blown away!  From the initial planning to the day of our event this team has you covered!  We highly recommend Midtown Loft and Terrace for your next special event!! Stay tuned amazing pictures to follow.

originalText.text: This space is so beautiful, elegant and also professional. It's been perfect for us to grab quick photos for our social media with its natural light, beautiful furnishings and stunning view of the empire state building. Will definitely come back!
